title: Correct procedure for Jummah Khutbah - Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: sameer says what is the correct procedure of jehovah the sermon of jummah is made of two it begins when the imam enters the masjid and he greets the congregation by saying assalamualaikum warahmatullahi wabarakatuh and he sits down the Morehead then announces the advance after the event is over he stands up he delivers the first sermon first hotbar then he concludes it by sitting down and then he stands up and delivers the second hot WA then he concludes it and comes down from the pulpit and gives the prayer of Torah cars of the Friday salat
